introduction.title: Welcome
introduction.description: A Discord Bot made for communities that like playing games together, this bot makes creating random teams easier than ever before, with one simple command like !game, the bot will fetch all users from the voice channel and will create and manage the teams for you.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: Arguments are a set of options that you can use to customize your games, like choosing team size, members per team, add members or remove members, add custom voice channels, create asymmetric games like 1v4 and much more.

gamemodes.title: Game Maps, Roles & Modes
gamemodes.description: The bot has different games to choice from and depending on the game they can have maps, roles and modes that are randomly set. you can choose games like Valorant, Counter Strike: Global Offensive, League of Legends, Standoff 2, Rainbow Six Siege and much more.
